snippet: Europe’s top economic official said the two countries risked missing debt and deficit targets.
abstract: Olli Rehn, European Union's commissioner for economic and monetary policy, warns Italy and Spain that they risk missing important debt and deficit targets in first such review of national budget plans for 13 euro zone countries; announcement is part of effort to stave off kind of fiscal problems that fed crisis that nearly destroyed the euro.
lead_paragraph: Europe’s top economic official said the two countries risked missing debt and deficit targets.

headline.main: In Economic Review, Italy and Spain Get Warnings on Debt and Deficit
headline.print_headline: In Economic Review, Italy and Spain Get Warnings on Debt and Deficit
